qas.question: A growing number of new forms of procurement involves what?

answers.text: relationship contracting where the emphasis is on a co-operative relationship

qas.question: What is a PPP also known as?
Focus on what is to ameliorate the many problems that arise from the often highly competitive and adversarial practices within the construction industry.
What does the focus on forms of procurement try to prevent?
What relationship do finance initiatives involve?

plausible_answers.text: the principal and contractor and other stakeholders

qas.question: Who is the emphasis on when there is a private finance initiative?

plausible_answers.text: Public-Private Partnering (PPPs) aka private finance initiatives (PFIs)

qas.question: What is an example of adversarial practices that involve partnering?
What forms of procurement happen within the construction industry?
